abstract: Clear Channel Communications, the largest radio station operator in the United States, dismissed dozens of local D.J.'s this week, saying the cuts were part of a revamping of its about 600 regional radio stations.
snippet: Clear Channel Communications, the largest radio station operator in the United States, dismissed dozens of local D.J.'s this week, saying the cuts were part of a revamping of its about 600 regional radio stations.

headline.main: Clear Channel Cuts D.J.'s Across the Country
headline.print_headline: Revamp Puts Dozens Of D.J.’s Out of Work
